head.citation-title: Quaternion color face super-resolution based on position-patch
head.abstracts: Based on quaternion models, a color face super-resolution algorithm by position-patch is proposed. With the help of a set of low-resolution and corresponding high-resolution training face image pairs, given a low-resolution color face image, its high-resolution color face image patches can be reconstructed using the same position patches of each training image, then the final high-resolution face image can be formed by integrating these patches. Experiments show that the correlations of the red, green, blue components are fully used in the proposed algorithm, so that a high-resolution image with complete information can be effectively reconstructed without residue compensation. Copyright © 2011 Binary Information Press.
